brewery.brewery_description: The Felinfoel Brewery is the oldest brewery in Wales. It was the first brewery outside the United States to sell beer in cans.

beer.beer_description:
Our Felinfoel Stout is brewed using our unique blend of WGV and Challenger hop varieties and REAL CHOCOLATE MALT which gives a rich full flavoured drinking beer with a nice rich chocolate and coffee aroma and rounded after taste on the palate.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 405 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 82! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description:
Our Felinfoel Stout is brewed using our unique blend of WGV and Challenger hop varieties and REAL CHOCOLATE MALT which gives a rich full flavoured drinking beer with a nice rich chocolate and coffee aroma and rounded after taste on the palate.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

items.badge_description: While small, the brewing tradition of Wales is quite robust. As early as the 6th century the country began to form its very own distinct styles. That's 105 different beers from a brewery from Wales. Try 5 more for Level 22!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 10 check-ins with a photo.

beer.beer_description: Felinfoel ESB has a marvellously robust bitter ale giving lots of good body and a fruity aftertaste. A nice long finish on the palate with hints of toffee apple flavours.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 335 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 68!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 230 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 47!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 15 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 4!

beer.beer_description:
Our new IPA recipe influenced by the American Style of IPA beers, is golden straw in colour with a lacing head. It gives a nice aroma of floral hops and a background of malt on the nose. A nice medium-bodied beer that shows some caramelized malt on the palate with balanced bittering hops. The long finish has yet more of the floral notes encountered in the aroma.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

A nice medium-bodied beer that shows some caramelized malt on the palate with balanced bittering hops. The long finish has yet more of the floral notes encountered in the aroma.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

Double Dragon has an ABV of 4.2%. It is a full drinking, premium Welsh Ale, which is malty and subtly hopped. Double Dragon has a rich colour and smooth balanced character. This deep copper red ale has a tangy red fruit flavour with nutty, toffee overtones.

user.bio: World beers, holiday beers, old faves,  new finds... and stouts

beer.beer_description: Double Dragon has an ABV of 4.2%. It is a full drinking, premium Welsh Ale, which is malty and subtly hopped. Double Dragon has a rich colour and smooth balanced character. This deep copper red ale has a tangy red fruit flavour with nutty, toffee overtones.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 10 distinct venues!

beer.beer_description: Double Dragon has an ABV of 4.2%. It is a full drinking, premium Welsh Ale, which is malty and subtly hopped. Double Dragon has a rich colour and smooth balanced character. This deep copper red ale has a tangy red fruit flavour with nutty, toffee overtones.

Our new IPA recipe influenced by the American Style of IPA beers, is golden straw in colour with a lacing head. It gives a nice aroma of floral hops and a background of malt on the nose. A nice medium-bodied beer that shows some caramelized malt on the palate with balanced bittering hops. The long finish has yet more of the floral notes encountered in the aroma.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

A new permanent addition to our canned craft ale range. At 4.5% this is a full drinking premium Welsh Ale which is malty and gently hopped. Dragons Heart has a rich colour and smooth balanced character with lots of red fruit flavour and buttery overtones.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger
Felinfoel ESB has a marvellously robust bitter ale giving lots of good body and a fruity aftertaste. A nice long finish on the palate with hints of toffee apple flavours.

Our Felinfoel Stout is brewed using our unique blend of WGV and Challenger hop varieties and REAL CHOCOLATE MALT which gives a rich full flavoured drinking beer with a nice rich chocolate and coffee aroma and rounded after taste on the palate.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger

This is one of our heritage range of ales brewed to a quaffable strength of 4.3% abv. This gorgeous ale has a predominantly nutty, caramel malty flavour which gives a robust and full bodied bitterness complimented by aromas of butterscotch vanilla and a slightly sweet fruity after taste. Delicious !!

HOPS: WGV & Challenger
A light golden ale with fresh flavour and distinct citrus overtones brewed using crystal malt and challenger and wgv hops.

The bottled Thames Welsh ESB starts an opaque dark brown color with a creamy head. Bold, rich malty aromas first leap from the glass. The complex malts offer sherry-like notes. The medium-bodied brew delivers a dry, malty flavor that is well rounded and matched with a very smooth mouthfeel. At 6.5% ABV, it makes an impressive showing as a full-flavored Extra Special Bitter that features more than just hops.

This golden coloured ale is brewed using a unique blend of hops including noble hops. Gold in colour with a moderate bitterness from the noble hops, Celtic Gold has a lean and attenuated body, but is full of character, packs flavour and has a beautiful crisp finish.

HOPS: WGV & Challenger
A nutty, malty brown ale. Made using WGV, Challenger hops and pure Welsh water. Perfectly pairs with Welsh beef!
Summer Ale
Export strength version of Double Dragon...not seen for many years!
